SamPy.db.DB.DBSMN

SamPy.db.DB.DBSMN¶

class SamPy.db.DB.DBSMN(sql, user, password, database, address)¶

Wrapper class to fetch data from a database. Separate functions for Sybase and MySQL database. A new class instance must be initialised for every server/database combination.

__init__(sql, user, password, database, address)¶

Init

Methods

__init__(sql, user, password, database, address) Init
fetchMySQLData() Function to fetch data from MySQL database.
fetchSybaseData() Function to fetch data from Sybase database.
